text: The Natural is a 1984 American sports movie. It is based on Bernard Malamud's 1952 novel of the same name. It is directed by Barry Levinson. It stars Robert Redford, Glenn Close, and Robert Duvall. The movie was nominated for four Academy Awards. Many of the baseball scenes were filmed in 1983 at War Memorial Stadium in Buffalo, New York. The All-High Stadium, also in Buffalo, stood in for Chicago's Wrigley Field in a key scene. ==References== Category:1984 drama movies Category:1980s sports movies Category:American sports movies Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Barry Levinson Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies set in the 1930s
title: The Natural (movie)
